website_summaries.verdict: A rugged case made specifically for the Xbox One X.
pros: This case securely fits the Xbox One X, 2 controllers, and Kinect
Includes 7 disc pockets so you don't need to bring game cases
The zipper is reliable, and this case works perfectly for air travel
cons: Only fits the Xbox One X
A somewhat high price tag considering the quality of materials

customer_reviews.title: If you ever move your Xbox One X around... Buy this!
customer_reviews.text: It works perfectly for the xbox one x. I move back and forth daily from house to house to apartment and I don't know how I did it before this honestly. More than enough room for cords and controllers and a few gadgets. Headset did not fit (Mine is very large, a smaller one would probably depending on what else is inside) but I was not expecting it to anyway because of its awkward shape and clunkyness. Hard outer shell protects everything so there are no worries. Highly highly recommended for anyone who moves an xbox one x around.
customer_reviews.author: Kane O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: Works, but not worth the price of admission.
customer_reviews.text: I could buy a small briefcase from Walmart with lots more function and better build quality for $12 less than this...with wheels I might add. This is a very cheap bag for what you pay for it. The console is also kind of loose in the bag. I kept it just because I wanted something small to carry my Xbox One X with me on the road.
customer_reviews.author: darok2

customer_reviews.title: Far less bulky than I expected, just what we needed
customer_reviews.text: We needed this after acquiring an Xbox unexpectedly while traveling. I was very pleased at the size. After the size of the box the Xbox originally came in, I was worried about having to fly home with it. But this fit nicely in the overhead bin, but still felt secure for carrying the console. Held the accessories that came with it without problem. Strap felt strong, which had been another concern, since we had to carry this for a while. Now the case is convenient for storing the console at home. A good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: R. Nilsson

customer_reviews.title: Works well. Not padded at all.
customer_reviews.text: Works well, but has nearly no padding. However, I can fit my Xbox One X, a controller, HDMI cable, power cable, controller charger, and Turtle Beach wireless headset. So everything I need fits in one container, but I don’t expect my stuff to stay safe in a fall. I put this in a secure place in the car when I travel, so it does what I need. Doesn’t take up a lot of room either.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: Solid Low Profile Case
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a case to use for transporting my Xbox One X in my luggage. Since this would be riding in my luggage I don't need extreme protection. Just basic protection and a slim, low profile case. The console fits snuggly on one side of the case. On the other side I was able to fit a conroller, game case, power cord and HDMI cord. This case does exactly what I need it to do at a resonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Adam C.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect travel case. My son used to use a backpack, but it was very scary to transport. Now he uses this case all the time. Great durable case. His friend ended up buying one after he saw my sons.
customer_reviews.author: Believer

customer_reviews.title: Protects the kids Xbox when traveling
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy case and holds Xbox and charger and headphone and controller
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Travel safe
customer_reviews.text: These are definitely worth the purchase, the hold everything other than games. They are compact and still protect your entire console. Definitely recommend for travelers.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect replacement for the original box
customer_reviews.text: Fits everything perfect. After my original box got wet, I had to get something else. Saw this, and am very happy. My Xbox is nice and secure when I have to move it between my dorm room and back home.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: My kid loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my son and he loves it. It fits his console, wires, controllers, etc. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: The Burro

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: This case seemed like a great product but had to return it due to it not fitting my Xbox one first gen console.
customer_reviews.author: jjftl

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and durable product. Makes taking xbox to and from college a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: outnumbered521

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for traveling. Everything stayed in place, and was able to move compartments around to fit my accessories. Overall very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfect fit and size
customer_reviews.text: not too big and just enough padding to make it work well.
customer_reviews.author: daolevsky

customer_reviews.title: Cool case
customer_reviews.text: My grandson was very pleased he takes his Xbox to spend the night with kids from time to time
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Peterson

customer_reviews.title: This case is really nice love it really recommend it I just throw mines ...
customer_reviews.text: This case is really nice love it really recommend it I just throw mines in but really nice I give it a 5
customer_reviews.author: Dyon McGann

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for my son’s XBox1. It’s a great fit.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta Meekins

customer_reviews.title: Nice hard case
customer_reviews.text: Super strong. ONLY FOR XBOX ONE X. Dumb me didn’t read and it didn’t fit for me original Xbox one. So I returned it however it was durable and nice looking.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Simply the best. It fits the xbox one x console perfectly and has plenty space for accessories. The top allows yiu to customize de layout with divisions. Just loved it, its elegant seems good material.
customer_reviews.author: julianavicentesantos

product_meta.title: Hermitshell Travel Case Fits Xbox One X 1TB Console + Kinect Sensor + Wireless Controller
product_meta.description: Hermitshell Travel Case Fits Xbox One X 1TB Console + Kinect Sensor + Wireless Controller
feature_bullets: Hermitshell Hard Travel Storage Carrying Case, Compact design with hand strap and shoulder strap for travel
Protect your Xbox One X from dust, UV, liquids (repellent), bumps dents and scratches

2 Built-in straps to secure the console, 4 removable dividers to secure the kinect and 2 controllers and other accessories, built-in divider with 7 disc pockets to divide the console from other accessories
Material: EVA+Nylon fabric, Color: Black ; Internel size :12.7*10*5.2
For sale is case only (device and accessories are sold separately)
